theory: Robin is being blackmailed or forced to betray the Straw Hats rather than acting of her own free will
author: General Fan Community (2005)
sourceTitle: Common viewer speculation during Water 7 Arc first airing
evidence: Robin's generally loyal behavior toward the crew in previous arcs
The mysterious 'tall masked man' accompanying Robin suggests external forces
Robin's troubled history and constant running from the World Government
counterEvidence: Iceburg clearly identified Robin as his attacker
Robin was physically present at the crime scene
resolution: Confirmed in Episode 251 - Robin was blackmailed by CP9 who threatened to use a Buster Call on the Straw Hats if she didn't cooperate.

theory: The Galley-La Company's strongest members (Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa) are secretly working for the World Government
author: Observant Viewers (2005)
sourceTitle: Fan speculation based on unusual combat abilities
evidence: Lucci and Kaku display combat abilities far beyond normal shipwrights in Episode 238
Kalifa seems overly involved in the investigation and information control
The 'tall masked man' mentioned by Iceburg could be one of them
counterEvidence: They've worked for Iceburg for years and appear loyal
Why would they attack their own boss?
resolution: Confirmed in Episode 245 - Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno are revealed to be CP9 agents who infiltrated Galley-La Company 5 years prior.

theory: Franky will eventually join the Straw Hat Pirates as their shipwright
author: General Fan Community (2005)
sourceTitle: Common speculation based on story patterns
evidence: Franky displays unique shipbuilding-related abilities (cyborg body)
The Straw Hats need a shipwright after losing the Going Merry
Franky gets significant screen time and character focus
His sense of honor shown when warning Galley-La not to interfere suggests potential for redemption
counterEvidence: Franky is currently an enemy who beat up Usopp
He seems too antagonistic to join the crew
resolution: Confirmed in Episode 322 - Franky officially joins the Straw Hat Pirates as their shipwright after the Enies Lobby Arc.
